>> A =

     1     0    10
     2    10    20
     3    35     2
     4    40    10
     5    55    30
     6    90     5
     7    97     1
>> save('A.dat','A','-ascii')
>> clear all
>> load('A.dat')
>> A

A =

     1     0    10
     2    10    20
     3    35     2
     4    40    10
     5    55    30
     6    90     5
     7    97     1
